snippet.title: The Rough Guide to Berlin \- Page 268
snippet.description: A true Berlin experience. Santiago Bar, Wbrther Str. 36. Light, colourful bar with tasty Latin American snacks and meals. Across the street from Kollwitzplatz. Schwarz Sauer, Kastanienallee 13-14. A trendy little cafe with pavement seating.

snippet.description: Pankow(Pankow, Prenzlauer Berg, Weißensee) Prenzlauer Berg is a trendy district in the former East Berlin which is undergoing gentrification and ... Popular with students, artists and media professionals, it is made up of lots of cafes and bars.

snippet.title: Berlin, Alexanderplatz: Transforming Place in a Unified ... - Page 125
snippet.description: The café in the Scheunenviertel, where the Bürgervertretung used to hold some of its meetings and where we had arranged to meet, had closed down, so we relocated to one of the trendy bars that had sprung up in the area since unification.

snippet.title: A History of Homosexuality in Europe, Vol. I & II: Berlin, ...
snippet.description: Homo bars and nightclubs had sprung up not only in the trendy districts of west Berlin, but also in the poor neighborhoods. One might see a line of Mercedes in front of the homo bars as well as in front of the upper crust lesbian nightclubs.
